alert.note: Alert for Breckinridge; Meade (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 7:31PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Meade and northeastern Breckinridge Counties through 745 PM EDT/645 PM CDT/... At 730 PM EDT/630 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles north of Hardinsburg, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Meade and northeastern Breckinridge Counties, including the following locations... Sirocco, Chenaultt, Lodale, Mooleyville, Raymond, Frymire, Manning Crossing, Payneville, Rhodelia and Union Star. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
